citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:00 pm on 23 Sept
2021. Made contact with licensee's wife who confirmed no one was available at the time of inspection.
Additional Inspectors:
Amanda Pope, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER
Sarah Cattaneo, ANIMAL CARE INSPECTOREnd Section
